程序包 daiwei.tojava.taskmanager

类 TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • daiwei.tojava.taskmanager.TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    This TaskList class to add Task,add deadline in TaskManager, and edit, delete the TaskManager.
    从以下版本开始:
    TaskManager lvl6
    版本:
    2018.11.2
    作者:
    David

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      TaskList()
      entity TaskList with empty parameter
      TaskList​(java.util.List<Task> tasks)
      This constructs a TaskList with a List parameter

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void addDeadline​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      This function is to add deadline.
      void addTodo​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      This function is to add todo.
      void clearTasks()
      This function is to clear TaskManager.
      void deleteTasks​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      This function is to delete tasks.
      void editTasks​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      this function is to edit tasks.
      void markAsDone​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      This function is to mark tasks as done.
      void saveTasks()
      This function is to call Storage.save method to save tasks.
      void searchTasks​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      this function is to search tasks with a any keyword
      void showTasks​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
      This function is to print tasks.
      void sortTasks()
      This function it to sort tasks with deadline time.

      • addTodo

        public void addTodo​(java.lang.String fullCommand)
             throws TaskManagerException
        This function is to add todo.
        参数:
        fullCommand - tasks'fullcommand
        抛出:
        TaskManagerException - if createtodo have error can throw this exception.

        This function is to add deadline.
        参数:
        fullCommand - tasks'fullcommand
        抛出:
        TaskManagerException - if create deadline have error can throw this exception.
